title: Which furniture would you take?

embed.description: A house will never be considered a home unless it has been furnished in full. Unless you want your house to look sparse and bare, it is imperative to buy the requisite furniture. The living room must have a sofa, some chairs, maybe a shelf and cabinet, a center table and some side tables as well.

body:
Out of this article which furniture would you take?

The Magnetic Floating Bed seems like an interesting pick mehehehehehe
